will apt-get only works on repositories, it does get the information from a file, but not just any file on your filesystem

will you can, but its not necessary. besides you might want to update soon, keeping the source tree makes the cvs update simpler and quicker

the command to delete something is "rm" for remove, rm usually only works on files. however, you can delete a directory and its contents with "rm -r /path/to/the/directory"
to delete an empty directory use "rmdir"
